1.speaker: PANDA
1.character: ねぇ　シロクマくん

5.speaker: POLAR BEAR
5.definition: Like when I'm able to make something like this. It's a polar bear.

6.speaker: PANDA
6.character: ねぇ　どうやったの？

10.speaker: PANDA
10.character: 写真？　カメラ持ってるんだ？
10.definition: A picture? You have a camera?

11.speaker: PENGUIN
11.definition: Not a camera, exactly. I bought a sumafo (smartphone).

12.speaker: PANDA
12.character: なに？　スマフォって
12.definition: What's a sumafo? That would be you rolled up in a reed mat {\i1}(sumaki){\i0}.

13.speaker: PENGUIN
13.definition: Those are rice dumplings wrapped in bamboo leaves {\i1}(chimaki){\i0}.

18.speaker: PENGUIN
18.character: スマフォだよ！　ス　マ　フォ！(-_-;)
18.definition: I said sumafo! As in smartphone! A sumafo, it's a kind of cell phone.

19.speaker: SASAKO
19.character: あっ！　ペンギンさん それが　スマートフォンですか？
19.definition: Oh, Mr. Penguin, is that one of those sumafos?

20.speaker: SASAKO
20.character: 私も　よく知らないんですよね
20.definition: I don't know much about them either.

22.speaker: SASAKO
22.definition: What can it do? It's really convenient. There are lots of apps too.

23.speaker: LLAMA
23.character: 地図とかも見られますしね
23.definition: And you can look up maps and such.

24.speaker: PENGUIN
24.character: ネットだって見られるんだよ　ほら
24.definition: You can browse the Internet too! See?

25.speaker: SASAKO
25.character: なんか　小さくて 字　読みづらくないですか？
25.definition: Aren't the words rather small and hard to read? Not at all! That's when you do this.

26.speaker: PENGUIN
26.character: パンチ操作って言ってね

28.speaker: LLAMA
28.character: ピンチ操作じゃないですか？

29.speaker: PENGUIN
29.character: 似たようなもんでしょ

32.speaker: PENGUIN
32.character: いい？　笹子さん　見てて…

33.speaker: SASAKO
33.character: 本当に　それ　便利なんですか？
33.definition: Are you sure it's actually convenient? It's convenient, really!

34.speaker: PENGUIN
34.definition: Let's see, it goes like this...

35.speaker: POLAR BEAR
35.character: そのうち　簡単に 操作できるようになるよ
35.definition: It'll get easier to use over time. Oh, you have one, too, Polar Bear? Yup. Here, check it out.

37.speaker: PANDA
37.character: あぁ～　かっこいい！  (m´・ω・｀)m

38.speaker: SASAKO
38.character: シロクマさん　器用ですね
38.definition: You're so talented, Mr. Polar Bear!

39.speaker: POLAR BEAR
39.character: それほどでも アヤメの花　折ってみた
39.definition: It's nothing, really. I folded an iris.

42.speaker: PENGUIN
42.definition: All right! Look at this! You go like this...

44.speaker: PENGUIN
44.definition: It's no use. Don't worry. You just have to get used to it.

46.speaker: LLAMA
46.character: 僕も　スマフォですし
46.definition: I have a sumafo, as well. Oh, really?

48.speaker: PENGUIN
48.character: ラマさん　そういう君こそ 上手に操作できるの？
48.definition: I hear what you're saying, but are you sure you can actually use it, Mr. Llama?

49.speaker: LLAMA
49.character: もちろんですよ　見ててください
49.definition: Of course. Just watch. Wow, that's amazing! Such flexible technique!

51.speaker: LLAMA
51.character: あっ　プロフ交換します？
51.definition: Oh, do you want to exchange profiles?

53.speaker: POLAR BEAR
53.character: お勧めの便利なアプリ　知ってるよ
53.definition: I know some really cool apps.

54.speaker: PENGUIN
54.character: え？ なになに？　教えて！

55.speaker: PANDA
55.character: やっぱ時代は　スマフォだよね
55.definition: We're totally in the sumafo generation!

58.speaker: PANDA
58.character: スマフォがあると すっごく便利なんだから
58.definition: It's really convenient to have a sumafo!

60.speaker: PANDA
60.character: 画面を ちまちま触って操作したり…
60.definition: You can control the screen by poking it.

62.speaker: PANDA
62.character: くちばしで　つついたり…
62.definition: You can poke it with your beak.

63.speaker: PANDA
63.character: そんでもって 字が　すっごく小さくて
63.definition: And the words are really tiny and hard to read!

64.speaker: MAMA PANDA
64.definition: Are you sure it's actually convenient?

66.speaker: PANDA
66.character: とにかく　外で働いてるパンダが ケータイ持ってないなんて
66.definition: Anyway, a working panda like myself cannot possibly get by

68.speaker: MAMA PANDA
68.definition: You'll get by just fine. You don't need one.

69.speaker: PANDA
69.definition: I don't like that train of thought.

71.speaker: PANDA
71.character: ほら　ケータイあると 何かあったときに便利だよ
71.definition: You see, if something happens, it'd be really convenient to have a cell phone.

73.speaker: MAMA PANDA
73.character: ねぇ　キッチンのバルサミコ酢が きれちゃったの
73.definition: Hey, we're out of balsamic vinegar.

74.speaker: MAMA PANDA
74.character: バイト帰りに買ってきてくれる？
74.definition: Could you get some on your way home from work?

77.speaker: MAMA PANDA
77.character: いいわよ　買ってあげる
77.definition: All right, I'll buy you one.

80.speaker: SASAKO
80.definition: What is it? I made the picture I took the other day my standby screen wallpaper. Are you not making anything with origami today?

81.speaker: POLAR BEAR
81.character: えっ？ 気が向いたら

85.speaker: SASAKO
85.character: パンダくん　嬉しそうだね

88.speaker: PANDA
88.character: パンダカバーのスマフォだよ！
88.definition: It's a sumafo with a panda cover!

90.speaker: PANDA
90.character: いいでしょう～ 見つけるの苦労したんだよ
90.definition: It is, isn't it? It was really hard to find.

93.speaker: PANDA
93.character: ほら　好きな時に　いつだって 天気予報も見られるしね
93.definition: See? You can check the weather forecast whenever you want.

94.speaker: PANDA
94.character: 地図も見られるから 迷子にならなくて済むし
94.definition: And you can look up maps so you don't get lost.

95.speaker: PANDA
95.character: 頭にのせて バランス感覚も　みがけるし
95.definition: You can put it on your head and improve your balance, too!

96.speaker: PENGUIN
96.character: それ スマフォの使い方じゃないけどね
96.definition: That's not proper sumafo usage, though.

97.speaker: LLAMA
97.character: でも　ペンギンさんより 使いこなしてませんか？
97.definition: He seems to be using it better than you though, Mr. Penguin.

98.speaker: PENGUIN
98.character: ぼ　僕だって 待ち受けかえてるし
98.definition: B-But I changed my standby screen!

101.speaker: PANDA
101.character: 音楽だって聴けるしね
101.definition: And I can listen to music!

102.speaker: PENGUIN
102.character: だ　大丈夫だよ　パンダくん
102.definition: I-It's okay, Panda! Looks like the only thing that broke was the cover.

104.speaker: SASAKO
104.character: だから　元気出して

105.speaker: LLAMA
105.character: スマフォが無事でよかったです
105.definition: It's a good thing the sumafo is safe.

107.speaker: PANDA
107.character: 僕にとって…　スマフォは パンダカバーのおまけだから
107.definition: But for me, the sumafo was an accessory to the panda cover.

108.speaker: MAMA PANDA
108.character: あら　ちょっと スマホは　どうしたの？　スマホは

111.speaker: MAMA PANDA
111.character: バ　ル　サ　ミ　コ　酢よ　バールーサーミーコー酢！
111.definition: Bal-sa-mic vin-e-gar, got it? Bal-sam-ic vin-e-gar!

112.speaker: POLAR BEAR
112.character: この電話は　お客様の 都合により　出られません
112.definition: We're sorry, your call cannot be completed at this time.

113.speaker: MAMA PANDA
113.character: ちっとも便利じゃないわね　スマホ
113.definition: Sumahos aren't convenient at all, are they?

114.speaker: PANDA
114.character: あのさ　スマートフォンなんだから スマホじゃなくて　スマフォだよ
114.definition: You know, it's called a "smartphone," so it's "sumafo," not "sumaho."

115.speaker: MAMA PANDA
115.character: どっちだっていいじゃない

116.speaker: PANDA
116.definition: Hello! Could I get my usual, Polar Bear?

117.speaker: PENGUIN
117.character: パンダくん　ひょっとして 立ち直った？

119.speaker: PENGUIN
119.character: 心配した僕が　バカだったよ
119.definition: Apparently I was an idiot for worrying. Your sumafo is right here, Panda. Oh. I don't need the sumafo anymore. Are you just trying to act tough?

120.speaker: PANDA
120.character: 本気　だって　パンダじゃないし
120.definition: No, I'm serious. It's not even a panda.

121.speaker: SASAKO
121.character: えっ？　せっかく買ったんだから 大事に使ったら？
121.definition: What?  You just bought it, you should use it.

122.speaker: POLAR BEAR
122.character: パンダくん　これ見て　スマフォのケース

123.speaker: POLAR BEAR
123.definition: I tried folding something like this.

125.speaker: PENGUIN
125.character: これなら　紙だから割れないね
125.definition: This time, it's made out of paper so it won't break.

127.speaker: SASAKO
127.character: シロクマさん　さすが！

128.speaker: PANDA
128.character: フフッ　やっぱり　パンダは最高だね
